In the West Bank, chief Palestinian negotiator Saeb Erekat said that the Palestinians and their backers have agreed on the wording for the anti-settlement resolution. Mike Pence of Indiana and Greg Walden of Oregon unveiled this week the Broadcaster Freedom Act, which would ban the FCC from forcing broadcasters to give free airtime to opposing sides on controversial issues. The American people cherish freedom, especially freedom of speech and of the press, said Mike Pence , a former radio talk show host who introduced the same bill in the last session of Congress when Democrats still controlled the House. video series "What Lies Ahead." "I hold the view that there's no single element of our public policy that is more harmful to American jobs than our high corporate tax rate." This is an administration that has spent a lot of the last two years suggesting that there's no relationship between capital formation and taxes, Mike Pence said. "And so to hear the president acknowledge that one of the leading factors that are driving American jobs overseas is our extraordinarily high corporate tax rate was welcome indeed.
